EmailTemplate.name: Ticket Support Request
EmailTemplate.subject: We have received your Hive support ticket #{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for creating a Hive support ticket. Here is a summary of your ticket.
- Ticket ID: {!Case.CaseNumber} - Record Type: {!Case.RecordType - Summary: {!Case.Summary__c} - Ticket Details: !Case.Link}
Please be aware of our SLAs for providing an initial response:
- Critical (business function is blocked) - 24 hours - High (inconvenient workarounds exist) - 3 business days - Medium (workaround exists) - 5 business days - Low (low priority request) - 10 business days
You will be notified via email when the status of your Support Request will be changed
Warm regards,
Hive Support Team
